summary: This mod changes the weight and gold values of certain types of animal pelt, hide and animal tusk to better reflect their in-game value and worth for a greater sense of realism. Hunting is no longer a pointless and tedious pastime!
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the weight and gold values of certain types of animal pelt, hide and animal tusk to better reflect their in-game value and worth for a greater sense of realism. Hunting is no longer a pointless and tedious pastime!

Better Hunting Prices modifies the weight and gold values of these items according to multiple factors including:

- how hard said animal is to kill
- how rare said animal is in the game world
- how much application said animal\'s pelt/hide/tusk has in-game 
- and finally how big the item retrieved from said animal is, which ultimately determines the weight of the item, as i found current weight values were off mark and did not really integrate well with the whole hunting experience.

The items changed and their new values are as follows:

Bear Cave Pelt - weight: 5 value: 80
Bear Pelt - weight: 4 value: 70
Bear Snow Pelt - weight: 5 value: 100
Cow Hide - weight: 3 value: 40
Deer Hide - weight: 2 value: 35
Deer Pelt - weight: 2 value: 30
Fox Pelt - weight: 1 value: 20
Fox Pelt Snow - weight: 1 value: 35
Goat Hide - weight: 1 value: 10
Horse Hide - weight: 2 value: 40
Mammoth Tusk - weight: 11 value: 180
Werewolf Pelt - weight: 4 value: 85
Wolf Ice Pelt - weight: 1 value: 35
Wolf Pelt - weight: 1 value: 25
Dragon Scales - weight: 11 value: 280

//////Revision 2 now includes://////

Horker Tusk - weight: 6 value: 120

//////Revision 3 now includes://////

Sabre Cat Pelt - weight: 4 value: 75
Sabre Cat Snow Pelt - weight: 4 value: 90

//////Revision 4 changes://////

The price of Mammoth Tusk\'s have been reduced from 250 to 180.
The price of Dragon Scales have been increased from 250 to 280. All weight values remain the same.

As some users pointed out, the fact that Mammoth Tusks cost the same as Dragon Scales was not realistic in the Skyrim world, a fact that this mod previously did not take into account, and so the relevant changes have been made.

//////Revision 5 changes://////

Fox and Fox Snow Pelt prices have now been modified. 
Werewolf Pelt price increased from 50 to 85. 
All weight values remain the same.

//////Other Information://////

You can also find \"Better Hunting Prices\" on the Steam workshop.
author: Kaya Suleyman
